CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- /ui/DragUI/SelectedUnitInfo -- 드래그해서 선택한 유닛을 표시하는 UI 제어

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local UnitDataSet = _DataService:GetTable("Unit") local RowCount = UnitDataSet:GetRowCount()
local SelectedUnitInfo = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DragUI/SelectedUnitInfo") local SelectedUnitExample = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DragUI/SelectedUnitInfo/SelectedUnitExample")
for i=1, RowCount do local RowData = {} local Name = UnitDataSet:GetCell(i, 1)
RowData[Name] = UnitDataSet:GetCell(i, 2)
local CopiedEntity = _SpawnService:Clone(Name, SelectedUnitExample, SelectedUnitInfo) local CopiedEntityUnitImage = CopiedEntity:GetChildByName("UnitImage") local CopiedEntityCount = CopiedEntity:GetChildByName("Count")
CopiedEntityUnitImage.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.ImageRUID = RowData[Name] CopiedEntityCount.TextComponent.Text = "×0"
CopiedEntity:SetVisible(false) CopiedEntity:SetEnable(false) end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SetSelectedUnitInfo
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
for i, value in pairs(SelectedUnitCount) do local SelectedUnit = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DragUI/SelectedUnitInfo"):GetChildByName(i) local SelectedUnitCount = SelectedUnit:GetChildByName("Count") SelectedUnitCount.TextComponent.Text = "×" .. value
if value > 0 then SelectedUnit:SetVisible(true) SelectedUnit:SetEnable(true) else SelectedUnit:SetVisible(false) SelectedUnit:SetEnable(false) end end
